alert.note: Alert for Eastern Glacier; Eastern Pondera; Eastern Teton; Liberty; Toole (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 1:12PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Snow showers will affect portions of eastern Pondera, Liberty, northeastern Glacier, Toole, northeastern Teton and northwestern Chouteau Counties through 230 PM MDT... At 105 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking scattered snow showers across eastern Glacier, eastern Pondera and Toole counties, moving east at 20 mph. Some of the more intense snow showers are producing a quick burst of snow with visibility as low as one mile and temperatures quickly falling to the lower 30s. Some minor snow accumulation of one half inch or less is possible in grassy areas while roads remain wet. Locations impacted include... Shelby, Cut Bank, Conrad, Chester, Sunburst, Kevin, Oilmont, Ledger, Tiber Dam, Galata and Dunkirk. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 325 and 397. Highway 2 between mile markers 256 and 330. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Be prepared for quickly changing visibility and road conditions if traveling in these areas.
